message.body: Would you and pat be up for a private karaoke room tonight w/devin and david, penn and lela rosen, josh chancey and i?
Abso-fucking-litely
In the city with josh and the rosens. Headed to the brklyn brewery in williamsburg for an afternoon adventure. Where you at. When can we meet you!
Hey!!! We're at the ballet probably until 4... Not sure about plans after but meeting up with youse guys is on the docket. I'll be in touch!
Ok enjoy
Where are you now Sassy?
Brooklyn brewery at the bedford stop. David is coming at 5. Involves waiting in a bit of a line.
Where's the karaoke place?
Ok, checking in with pat. I'll let you know
Alright. i wanna find you!
Me too!!!!!!!! We're just trying to plan based on neighborhood and I need to ditch my stuff. Is the karaoke place in Brooklyn?
No. lower east side.
Cool. Pat says his place is in manhattan so we may meet you there... Or meet you somewhere before? What time are you thinking?
Perfect. Well probably head back well before karaoke. Lela lives in the east village. We could find each other around there
Back in manhattan. What you doing b? David is with me. We want to seeeee you
Where are you???
Took a baby disco nap as i was feelin a little sicky and am feeling as refreshed as a fetus. Let's meet up!!
Patty cakes is napping yet, so I'll monitor his vitals and be in touch. When is karaoke?
10. Wake him up and come to me! Where does he live?
Spanish harlem!!! I'll see what I can do. We got problematically day drunk.
I understand. Maybe just coming straight down the east side to karaoke is easiest. Its karaoke boho on houston and orchard. Look it up
Cool cool. When are you heading this way?
To karaoke? 9 45ish? Our resedrvation is at 10
Are you on your way? i am!
Yes yes!! So exciteddddddd
Me tooooo!!!
Were almost there. Where are you?
In a cab on the way
Me too!
Room starts at 10 30. Get here
Downstairs room 11
So close :)
Yes!
When are you free and what would you like to do??
Free now. Getting brunch with the rosens. I just got davids text about his show. I think that would be fun and short. Then maybe check out occupy if youre feeling radical
Yes! The play would be great!!! Pat works until 2ish and he'll meet us anywhere.
Great. Waiting to hear from dave on details
Dave says we shouls get there at 1. Wanna meet me and the rosens at MUD on 9th between 1st and 2nd? Were headed out in the next 10 so you could come down whenever
Yea, let me check out the transportation situation and give you an ETA
It might make the most sense just to meet at the theater
I think you're right, long train ride. See you there!
Are you at the theater?
Close, yep
I'm in line to make sure we have a spot, but we may not need to? You close?
Very.
Love you silly B
Love you soooo much! See you again soon!
